show.title: The Wake Up Call

title: Media Lies About The Economic “Recovery”
content:
Media Lies About The Economic “Recovery”   In the grand tradition of fomenting optimism despite deepening economic… gloom, we visit the 1930s and see that the media did the same thing then, too.
“Happy Days Are Here Again” was a song devised for the Democratic National Convention in 1932, yet “happy days” themselves did not arrive for another twenty years.
The media will maintain the fiction until the last possible moment.
There is not enough innovation to support new jobs, which is why there are so many dead-end jobs in existence.
They will go, too, with automation.
The lifespan of all corporations is getting shorter and shorter as they fail to adapt.
